page.title: 04PEOPLE IN PLYMTREE
page.content: All age groups can be found living in Plymtree. A large retired population is slowly being replaced by a younger generation with families. Most children attend Plymtree Primary School or nearby Secondary Schools. They walk or cycle to the Primary School but have to be bused to the Secondary Schools. A housewife spends her day looking after her family: cleaning, cooking and washing, but may have time for her hobbies or going for a walk. Some housewives do a part- time job for half the day away from their homes. Retired people do a little housework but often have help with the cleaning. They go for walks, watch television and read during the day. Most men who live in Plymtree work away from the village. Everyone likes living in Plymtree very much and we all get on very well together.
